stimulusHtml: In the convent of Santo Domingo in Cusco, the combination of Spanish Baroque architecture with Inka ashlar masonry walls represented
choicesHtml: a desire to merge Christian and Inka religious beliefs and practices
the Spanish adoption of Inka earthquake-proof construction techniques
a transition from worship of the Inka Sun god to worship of the Christian God
the shift from Machu Picchu to Cusco as the administrative center of Peru
